extendedInfo.description: Glance Note is a note application syncing with Simplenote.Features:- Sync with Simplenote- View / Create / Edit / Delete note- Find note (keyword search, tag search, sort)- Tag edit- Note settings (pin, markdown) edit- Two kinds of view mode (plain text, markdown preview)- Create a new note via Intent

reviews.title: Finally!  A solid simplenote app.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried them all.  This one just came out of nowhere.    Syncing appears flawless (I have > 150 notes) and the performance is amazing.  Markdown support is a bonus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Remove the ads
reviews.comment: Remove the ads please. The app should become popular first. Otherwise it\'s just annoying and doesn\'t make you any money. Also, add a paid version.
reviews.author: Lobak Vladimir

reviews.title: It now works perfetly. Thanks for fixing the bug
reviews.comment: I cant install on my huawei phone. It says package is not signed
reviews.author: Ezekiel Wanje

reviews.title: The best SimpleNote client
reviews.comment: Only four stars because I need a version without ads. A pay version please.
reviews.author: Junior Hernandez

reviews.comment: Easy  and just works. Saves all my ideas and notes and let\'s me find them effortlessly.
reviews.author: Mitchell Rabinowitz

reviews.title: Best of currently available
reviews.comment: Coming from WebOS, I was disappointed that there was not a client like Noted! for Android.  After trying all the Simplenote apps, I settled on Glance Note because it syncs properly and has a light-colored background.  I would like to see the sort option made persistent between sessions and greater control over font size. Otherwise, it works well.  Update 7/3/2013 Glad to see offline editing implemented - good work. Sort order still not persistent.
reviews.author: Ken Hirsch

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Good app but I lose all changes to my note when I switch apps without saving. This makes it hard to use this app when needing to switch back and forth between apps.
reviews.author: Vasek Cekan

reviews.title: Please remove ads!
reviews.comment: Option (paid, I suppose) to remove ads is so needed. Nevertheless, it\'s the best app for simplenote service. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but could be easier to use
reviews.comment: It does what it\'s supposed to, but it would be nice to the sync was automatic and editing a note didn\'t require using the menu button to being up an \"Edit\" command. Also, I\'ve lost changes due to switching to another app without first clicking \"Save and Sync\". Still, this is a decent app and works better than my old Simplenote app, Notational Acceleration.
reviews.author: Paul Muschick

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Needs automatic sync and a cleaner uite, for starters. It takes a minimum of three taps to edit a note.
reviews.author: Adrian R\304\203dulescu

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Android needs this Simplenote client badly...  Very good start!  Please let me pay for removing ads...
reviews.author: Vincent Vercauteren

reviews.title: Double tags on Samsung Note 2
reviews.comment: This is a great app for singers like me where I had my Simplenote account organized in alphabetical tags. However, I found out that my tags are now double. Thankfully, not on Simplenote web or other devices. Only on my Samsung Note 2.
reviews.author: Sarita Carreon

reviews.title: Easy and Simply
reviews.comment: Downloaded, synced smoothly, and done.  Which Notational Acceleration never did.  Clean interface.  I\'m thrilled.
reviews.author: Rachel Bayles Lacey

reviews.title: Offline saving is a must.
reviews.comment: Seriously.  Two things the a note-taking app *have* to do well: offline editing, sync when online; and be reliable: never ever ever lose user data.
reviews.author: Rodolfo Borges

reviews.title: Very promising!
reviews.comment: Works and looks very nice.I just miss incremental search.
reviews.author: Robert Pergl

reviews.title: Is https protocol used?
reviews.comment: cannot connect to simplenote from China. maybe https protocol can help. Thank you!
reviews.author: Shaojian Jiang

reviews.comment: Lags & ads
reviews.author: Pan Waltz

reviews.title: Didn\'t work, they updated it, now it works well!
reviews.comment: On my Nexus 7 (Jelly Bean 4.1) it would not sync. At first, I thought it was because it wasn\'t taking my Password. I wrote to the Developer and they said that it didn\'t \'show\' my Password (even as ***** but that it was still \'Storing it\'.   I wrote back and said \"OK, but it\'s still not working. It keeps telling me that \'sync failed\'...  Why?\".  They then alerted me of a new update that they said fixed my issue.  I tried out the new version and it is now working well on my Nexus w/Jelly Bean.
reviews.author: Chris Blaisdell

reviews.title: Good App + Responsive Developer
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work offline, and UI doesn\'t follow the new ICS/JB standards. The search and tagging issues are not a problem for me. I am running Galaxy Nexus now on Jelly Bean 4.1 and Asus Infinity now also running Jelly Bean 4.1. Both however, were used on ICS.  In the 1.3 version, I had an issue with creating new notes. I emailed the developer, and the issue was promptly fixed and the developer responded to me notifying of the fix. Truly appreciated!!  Definitely my preference over the other SimpleNote apps out there.
reviews.author: Michael Worthington

reviews.title: Great app - Samsung Galaxy 3
reviews.comment: Glance Note is a terrific straightforward and easy to use text editor as well as a SimpleNote client assisting text to seamlessly synchronise between android, pc and apple environments. It\342\200\231s the best way I have found to easily synchronise text across multiple platforms \342\200\223 and I have tried around 6 others. The Authors responded quickly to a recent glitch and had their program back synchronising in no time. Thanks very much. I could not praise it more.
reviews.author: Richard Jacobs
